steps.name: Given  the user is on the Banking Info screen with email: "decisionscreen@flexshopper.com"
And  the user enters a valid routing number: "325070760"
And  the user enters a valid account number: "3333333333"
And  the user enters a matching account number: "3333333333"
When  the user clicks on the button: "Submit Application"
Then  the user lands on the Decision Screen with decision: "You were approved for a spending limit of"

parameters.name: decision
parameters.value: You were approved for a spending limit of
